etis breath was a cold mixed alcoholic beverage that was served in inns and taverns across the Realms during the 14 century DR, such as the Hidden Lady.
A yetis breath was an aptly named ice-cold drink. It felt freezing to the drinker because it contained the essential ingredients of crushed ice and tapdragon (a sugar cane molasses-distilled strong alcoholic beverage), with added darsargar (powdered ginger root), and menthol, which was made from wild peppermint plants oil.
